name: Project Rex
description:
A simple FPS game I made. This is just a prototype. The enemy AI are pretty stupid....

The game made for the PROCJAM and the 7dfps jam.  This is an old idea I renewed and made a minimum viable product for it. I do plan on working on it, but not any time soon.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD/ Arrow Keys: to move

Space Bar: Jump

Left Click: shoot

Left Shift: sprint

P: pause the game.

There is a bug when you restart the game, you are still in the pause menu. just press p to leave the menu.
